Class AstNode

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.parboiled.trees.GraphNode<AstNode>, org.parboiled.trees.MutableTreeNode<AstNode>, org.parboiled.trees.TreeNode<AstNode>, AstNodeType
public class AstNode
extends org.parboiled.trees.MutableTreeNodeImpl<AstNode>
implements AstNodeType

Very simple Abstract Syntax Tree node implementation based on a MutableTreeNodeImpl. Defines two fields and some convenience setters.
